text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
────So, when should we schedule the lesson...

Yeah, weekends would be best.
How about this day?
Okay, um...

Ah... um, is it possible to do it on another day...?
If possible, I'd like to have the day off...

Oh, really?
I'll check on that.
I'm sorry...!

The following week... If the teacher isn't available,
it might be the week after that.

If it takes too long to confirm,
that day will be fine...!

Don't worry about it. It's not much trouble
to check with the teacher...

And besides... I'm happy you asked
for a day off, Haruki.
Huh... why is that?

Haruki, you always prioritize lessons
and work first, right?

I'm grateful for that, but I also want you
to have more time for yourself.
Thank you...!

──But, being an idol is also an important
time for me, you know?
Oh, right.
──Actually, a friend of mine is having an exhibition.
I've been invited to help with the setup and reception...

Oh... I see.
I hope you can go.

────In that case, let's take that day off.
I'll figure something out for the lesson.
Huh... okay...!

You might think it's unrelated
to your idol work────

But for "Haruki Ikuta",
it's really important, right?
Uh... yes, I think so...!

Then it's settled.
Have fun.

──Oh, it's from Haruki.
Even though it's her day off...
Oh... pictures are coming in one after another...!
Haha...
"This is the venue!"
"This is my friend's booth."

"There are lots of other interesting things.
I took a lot of photos."
She's having a good time...
And she's smiling nicely.

"It looks so interesting.
Tell me all about it next time we meet."

"Is that okay?
It might take a while."

"Even though it's my day off, I thought of so many
things I want to talk to you about, Producer-san."
Maybe I should stop here...!
